would be like uh you know
uh uh not studying the Bible uh or not

Devolution some might argue of politics

among uh and within the black community
I mean obviously hip hop has created

the kinds of uh things that are

understand the tensions within
Generations uh in the black community I
mean this is you know the use of the
n-word right and we have a corollary uh
um you know tension within the gay
community over the word queer right it's
not the same thing but I think there it
it provides a point of comparison which
is instructive and important that older
Generations the older generation of the
black community doesn't want to listen
to the nword and certainly doesn't want
its children and grandchildren using a

therefore subject to discrimination and

thing can be said of the word queer
older uh uh LGBT folks um you know who

among young people and among people my
age even uh in the younger generation of

think any time you have a kind of form

emanates from youth that emanates from

mean I joke with my students uh that
they take my course because it's
American protest literature from Tom

they're hungry to understand how this
